item.text: <textHeader>WHAT IS IT?</textHeader> <textBody>The Creative Toolkit contains approved creative assets that can be utilized to support College/University basketball events for TCCC Contractual Media commitments with Sports Partners. This toolkit is categorized by lead and support brand, segmented by medium, with complete information pertaining to each asset, including where to obtain, usage dates, and key contacts.</textBody> <textHeader>OBJECTIVE</textHeader> <textBody>Creative assets developed to generate Brand awareness and drive volume during basketball events.</textBody> <textHeader>MEDIUMS</textHeader> <textBody>Program Ads Program Ads TV Ads Radio Ads Radio Scripts (English/Spanish) TV Sponsorship Billboards</textBody>

WHAT IS IT? Trademark enhancement is best in class activation of our assets with sustaining communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results. / In-Venue Zone Strategy / MAA Guiding Principles / MAA Implementation Tools / Customer Sales Aid OBJECTIVE Creative customized elements utilizing pre approved templates facilitate asset activation in-venue. ACTIVATION ZONES Zone 1 – Concession Zone 2 – Concourse/Stadium Zone 3 – Entrance/Parking Lot Live Positively Messaging

<textHeader>BRAND GUIDELINES</textHeader> <textBody>Priority Sparkling: 1) Coca-Cola 2) Coke Zero 3) Sprite 4) Diet Coke
Priority Still for Colleges: 1) vitaminwater base 2) vitaminwater Zero 3) PowerAde ion 4 4) smartwater</textBody> <textNote>* These priorities should be followed when activating sustaining elements. All appropriate promotional brands should be used to support national program efforts.</textNote>

ORDERING Order through Design Machine: / Website / User Guide Sizes currently available:
  • 8.5” x 11”
  • 5.5” x 8.5”
  • 7” x 10”
    • Customize with:
  • "Proud supporter of"
  • "Proud sponsor of"
  • Team name and logo

CUSTOMIZATION If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

item.title: 2012 Coke Zero Local TV All Sports

item.text: USAGE These TV ads can be used to run during live games or when broadcast on individual stations and can be used until creative changes. These ads can also run in non-broadcast venues (In-Venue, In-Store, In-Restaurant, Kiosks, Tradeshows, In-Flight, Cinema, Internal/External meetings) and Internet. NOTE: For Non-Broadcast, TV ads should be used when both video and audio capabilities are available. In-Venue Video Signage should be used when audio is not available.
ORDERING Submit orders for TV spots / Broadcast Use / Non-Broadcast Use / Internet Use Limited to 1 copy of each spot per location.

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.

item.text:
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> These TV Billboards are approved to run on live broadcasts during games. Scripts are not to be recorded, but only to be used as live reads.
Rotation should be equal depending on number of spots chosen to run.
ORDERING Submit orders for TV spots / Billboards for Broadcast Limited to 1 copy of each spot per location.

ORDERING Submit orders for Radio spots: / Radio - Individual Stations (broadcast from individual stations) / Radio - Network (broadcast from single location to multiple stations) / Radio - Non-Broadcast Use (for non-broadcast only - (In-Venue, In-Store, Internal/External meetings, Tradeshows) / Radio - Internet Use (internet/streaming)

<textHeader>LEGAL NOTICE</textHeader> By requesting delivery of this spot, you acknowledge that your department is fully responsible for any talent fees, licensing fees, or other charges incurred as a result of any use outside the permitted scope or time period set forth here.

item.title: Static Banners

- 300x250: Generic: “Taste What The Future Tastes Like”, “Taste Tomorrow Today”; Sponsor Banners w/ CZ Bottle: “Proud Partner With”, “Official Soft Drink Of”
- 728x90: Generic: “Taste What The Future Tastes Like”, “Taste Tomorrow Today”; Sponsor Banners w/ CZ Bottle: “Proud Partner With”, “Official Soft Drink Of”

- 300x250: Sponsor Banners w/ Twitter CTA: “Follow us on Twitter” (CZ Only), “Proud Partner With” (CZ+Sponsor), “Official Soft Drink Of” (CZ+Sponsor)
- 728x90: Sponsor Banners w/ Twitter CTA: “Proud Partner With” (CZ+Sponsor), “Official Soft Drink Of” (CZ+Sponsor)

item.text: ORDERING First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

CUSTOMIZATION Coke Zero Custom Web Banners are available for partner logo customization. If a custom size creative is needed, login to the Online Ordering Tool. First time Users must request user set up access. Finished Art / Website / User Guide / Request Access / Contact via Email

ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: The Howard Company / Website / Contact via Email to Order Weaver Media / Website / Contact via Email to Order For additional information on the suppliers, click the SUPPLIERS tab.

THE HOWARD COMPANY / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 6 main menu boards (sizes & types) and illuminated boards along with numerous specialty/custom boards for unique applications and locations. Variations include: with/without panel header, with/without acrylic cover, with digital LCD display
  • All menu boards use the same size strips and numbers although colors and font styles can be changed. Menu items and numbers are all separate
  • Magnets can be ordered online. All strips and numbers are direct printed on magnetic material
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as banners and adhesive graphics (floor and wall)
    •  WEAVER MEDIA / Website / Contact via Email
  • Offers 10 main menu boards including illuminated boards
  • All menu boards use magnetic strips (one strip that included menu items and prices)
  • Can provide other graphic applications such as adhesive graphics (floor and wall), concession stand graphics, banners

ORDERING Obtain pre-approved templates: Design Machine / Website
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestors responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved

ORDERING Visuals are reference only.
  • Customizable parameters – team logo upload and proportional re-sizing
  • It is the requestor's responsibility to ensure logos are partner approved
    • Obtain approved cups and/or templates as listed below:
  • PRIORITY #1 - Approved Red Coca-Cola Iconic Cups are available at the Coke Catalog
  • PRIORITY #2 – Approved Compostable & Environmentally Sustainable Cups can be found at Spread the Red. To be used ONLY in venues that have a composting program. (* Search Key Words “Green cupware”)
  • PRIORITY #3 - Approved Asset Specific Cup Templates can be ordered and customized by Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.
  • PRIORITY #4 – Approved artwork for Partner can be ordered by Finished Art. Contact Daphne Brown via email.
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine / Website

card.title: PUBLIC ANNOUNCEMENTS
card.approved: TO BE READ DURING LIVE GAMES ON PA SYSTEMS

item.text:
- Want a taste of everything? Drink Coke Zero, with real Coke taste AND zero calories.
- Share your team’s victory but not your Coke Zero. Enjoy that for yourself.
Share (team)’s victory but not your Coke Zero. Enjoy that for yourself.

- Draining a cold Coke Zero is like draining a buzzer beater for the win. Pure enjoyment.
- Every sip of Coke Zero is like a game winning shot for your taste buds.

- Hey (city), slam a can of Coke Zero in support of your (team name).
- Hey (winning team) fans, enjoy the lead with an ice cold Coke Zero.
- Hey (losing team) fans, enjoy the comeback with an ice cold Coke Zero.

- With real Coke taste AND zero calories, Coke Zero has a Double Double in Enjoyment every day. Coke Zero. Enjoy Everything.
- Every time you pop open an ice cold Coke Zero you make the highlight reel for taste. Coke Zero. Liquid proof you can have it all, and Enjoy Everything.

- Drinking a Coke Zero is like the (team name) throwing a game-winning alley oop to its star. Only this time it’s your hand alley ooping your mouth with enjoyment.
- (Team name) brought their A game tonight. Coke Zero brings theirs every night with real Coke taste AND zero calories. Pop open a cold one and Enjoy Everything.

- Having that first can of Coke Zero at the game is like having the first pick in the draft. You’re about to get the best. This season, pick Coke Zero. Because with real Coke taste AND zero calories, you really can have it all and Enjoy Everything.
- With real Coke taste AND zero calories, every time you pop open an ice cold Coke Zero you score a Double Double in enjoyment. Coke Zero, it’s liquid proof you really can have it all, and Enjoy Everything.

Having that first can of Coke Zero at the game is like (city) having the first pick in the draft. You’re about to get the best. This season, (team name), pick Coke Zero. Because with real Coke taste AND zero calories, you really can have it all and Enjoy Everything.

STATIC SIGNAGE ORDER INSTRUCTIONS This creative is approved to be used In-Venue on Static Vinyl and digital boards (LED back-lit/non back-lit, Dioramas, Rotational signs, Pillars, Stand-alone, Signs, Scoreboards).
  • All Brand graphics and artwork for Static signage used in stadiums, arena and other venues can be accessed online
  • This site provides the user with the ability to browse, view and download the currently available signage graphics. The brand signage graphics have been created in a wide variety of proportions and styles. Add them to your shopping cart for bulk down-loading and for forwarding to business partners or vendors
  • The digital files are saved in an EPS format and will require the end user to have a software program that can work with this file format
  • All designs adhere to the graphic standards set and approved by CCNA. By accessing this site, the user agrees to its terms of use
  • There is no cost to the user for existing graphics/artwork. If a user requires a non-standard size, contact Catherine Perry to discuss alternative options. Please note in such cases there may be a cost associated with the order, if so a quote will be provided and budget must be in place before the order can be filled
    •  / KO Signage User Guide / Contact via Email
<textHeader>USAGE</textHeader> This creative is approved to use In-Venue on video screens.

ORDERING Sizes have already been created and are listed below each design; they are available for download on the Cinema Concepts website. Should you require a non-standard size, you will need to fill out an order form. Note that there is a charge for customized sizes. Submit orders for In Venue Video Signage via email or 770.956.7460. / Website / cokeinvenue.com User Guide The website link will bring you into the signage site. Once in the site you can view all of the available graphics for Jumbo-Trons and fascia rings. Click on the image and Windows Media Player will display the animation. The order form is available in both Word and PDF formats; the PDF allows you to submit the order form directly. All requests should include the following information:
  • Type of Venue: In Arena, In Concession, Vending, In-Store, In Restaurant
  • Video Type: Jumbotron, Fascia, Video Menu Board, and u-Vending Video
  • Creative Code (found on site under creative visual)
  • Brand
  • Format: .avi, .mov, .swf
  • Size in pixels (width and height)
  • Method of Delivery: FTP Download or Overnight shipment (DVD or Digital Beta Tape)
    • There is a $250 charge per size for orders filled within 4 business days. For rush orders additional fees, as listed on the form, will apply. Billing information for CCNA requestors as well as CCE/Field Managers and Customers is explained on the order form.
